titleStmt.title: SII 30.216: original edition by N. Marxia Gandhi, A. Padmavathy and S. Swaminathan

No. 216. (A.R. No. 567 of 1915.) Dārukāpuram, Sankaranayinar koyil Taluk, Tirunelveli District. Madhyasthanātha temple-on the north and west walls of the central shrine and the west wall of the mukhamaṇḍapa. Iṟandakālameḍutta perumāḷ Śrīvallabhadēva: year 7, Śaka 1463, piḷava, Āvaṇi, 22, su. di. 7, Tuesday, Anusha: 1541 A.D.

summary.p: This inscription records a gift of one kuḻi and eight mā of land freed from taxes at Paṭṭakuṟichchi in Āri-nāḍu, to Kaṇdēru Sōmanātha Bhaṭṭa for compiling pañchāṅga (calendar)

revisionDesc.change: Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śubhamastu . Ādicaṇḍeśvarājñeyam . śakābdam 1000 4 100 9 10 3 l svastiśrī perumāḷ Iṟantakālameṭutta perumāḷ śrīvallabhadevaṟku yāṇṭu 7- vatu pilava varuṣam Āvaṇi māsam 2 10 2 pūrvvapakṣattu saptamiyum maṅkaḷavāramum ruṣabhakaraṇamum viṣkampayokamum peṟṟa Aṉuṣattu nā
ḷ Aśvatināḷ jātaṉāna naṅkumārart tirunelvelip perumāḷ tammuṉ pañcāṅkamākak kaṟpikkaiyil parāśara gotrattu Āpastamba sūtrattu kaṇṭeṟu somanātapaṭṭaṉukku Udakapūrva dānamāka koṭuttu bhoga moṉṟukku nam kulaiyaparattu nam Ādhyayaṉa kaḷuṭaṉ kūṭṭi viṭṭa maṉai
Oṉṟum toṭṭamum toṭṭakūṟum Ivarkaḷukku Uṇṭāṉa cutantiraṅkaḷum bhāgam Oṉṟukku nilam Orumāvukku cetta Ārināṭṭup paṭṭakuṟicci nam kaṇṭuḻavāpāṭṭan tiṟantuviṭṭanilamāvatu Ukaṟṟu kūli l viṭṭu kiṟā pala viṭṭu ki ṟā
ntu land measurements are given as symbols. Oṉṟāka taṭiyāka 4 kuṭutta kaṭṭi Iṉṉi vama kār patānam Aṟumukkaṭaiyavam vaṭa Iraṭṭi payir ceyyak kaṟpittu Innilattiluḷḷatu kuṭimai Antarāyama poṉvarip putuvari pañcipīli cantivikkiṟakappeṟu Ilāñciṉaippeṟum Epperppa Some portions are missing in between lines 4&5
vatu neṭuṅkuḷam perkuṭi pāṭṭam Ākaiyil naṅkumāraṉ Ōlaippaṭi kottukaṉ kaittaṭi paṭi koṭukka Usā kaiyil tiruvā
ḻikku kāṇiyāṭcai Iṟaiyili Āka kalattiṅku Uṭpaṭa Iṉṉilam kuḻi Oṉṟu mā 8 kku kār pacāṉa viḻukkāṭu ka
ṭaimai kuṭimai Antarāyam poṉvari maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭatum coṟu cuvantiṟamum nam Ālaiyattu vāyi(l)lār ka
ṇakkilum vaittu cantirātittavarai kallilum cempilum veṭṭi kaiyyāṇṭu koḷḷavum §
Digital edition of SII 30.216 by converted to DHARMA conventions by John Doe.
